commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* Hey, did you watch my performance?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! It was an amazing live show! I was so excited, I had goosebumps the whole time!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Me too. It's been a while since I've felt this floating sensation. It's like my feet aren't touching the ground.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I didn't even do any intense dancing, yet it feels like my heart's about to jump out of my mouth. *Chuckle*

commands.select_args: ||Your smile says you gave it your all!|| select_1
||My heart won't stop pounding either.|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Your smile says you gave it your all!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Who can blame me for this smile? I feel absolutely amazing right now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: My heart won't stop pounding either.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* That makes two of us, then.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I was a little nervous at first, though. Everyone's faces seemed confused when I started to sing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, I was watching in the wings, but I wasn't the slightest bit worried.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh? You must've had a lot of confidence in the song you composed, then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, that wasn't it. I was convinced when I heard you sing yesterday that there wouldn't be a soul who wouldn't fall in love with someone as wonderful as you.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, you...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But I was right, wasn't I?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes. The more I sang, the more I felt people falling in love with my song. I feel like I've gotten even closer to everyone now, thanks to you.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: To be completely honest, I kind of admired the intimacy of Setsuna's and Ayumu's live shows.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: They have a sense of unity, like everyone is part of creating the live show. But I feel as though I was able to experience that today myself. I created that atmosphere.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Do you feel like you'll become even more captivated by the world of school idols?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I can't escape from its clutches now. I can't thank you enough for inviting me into this magnificent world.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I can't thank you enough either. I'm sincerely glad that you joined the club, Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* Guess that makes us both lucky, then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All of your fans are also lucky since they got to see such a wonderful side of you.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, you sure know how to dish out great compliments!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm just telling you what I think. Oh, hey, do you mind if I take a photo?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Not particularly, but why the sudden request?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Because you really do have an amazing smile! It would be a waste for me to keep it all to myself. Is it okay if I post it online?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: If that'll make everyone happy, then go ahead.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yay, thanks! Okay, here I go. Say, cheese!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There. I got an awesome shot of your smile. I want to set it as my wallpaper, it's that beautiful.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hey, can you take one more photo? This time with you in it as well.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?! With me?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's right. One that we won't post online. Just for our wallpapers.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Seriously?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh? Don't you remember saying I can rely on you more? C'mon now, hurry up! Scooch in closer to me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: K-Karin, I can't breathe!
